intro: Psychotria tanganyicensis var. ferruginea, commonly known as the red-leaved psychotria, is a species native to eastern Africa. It is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family, characterized by its striking red foliage. The plant produces small, white flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, often found in tropical rainforests. Its unique appearance makes it a popular choice for ornamental gardening.
